text: Morocco competed in the Winter Olympic Games for the first time at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble, France. == Alpine skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Race 1 !colspan="2"|Race 2 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |Mimoun Ouitot |rowspan="4"|Giant Slalom |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |align="center"|- |align="center"|- |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |- |Mohamed Aomar |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |align="center"|- |align="center"|- |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |- |Hassan Lahmaoui |align="center"|2:24.97 |align="center"|90 |align="center"|2:23.69 |align="center"|84 |align="center"|4:48.66 |align="center"|86 |- |Said Housni |align="center"|2:24.40 |align="center"|89 |align="center"|2:16.28 |align="center"|80 |align="center"|4:40.68 |align="center"|83 |} ;Men's slalom {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !colspan="2"|Heat 1 !colspan="2"|Heat 2 !colspan="6"|Final |- !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time 1 !Rank !Time 2 !Rank !Total !Rank |- |Said Housni |align="center"|1:19.93 |align="center"|5 |align="center"|DNS |align="center"|- |colspan="6" align="center"|Did not advance |- |Mohamed Aomar |align="center"|1:29.54 |align="center"|6 |align="center"|1:20.03 |align="center"|4 |colspan="6" align="center"|Did not advance |- |Hassan Lahmaoui |align="center"|DSQ |align="center"|- |align="center"|1:09.16 |align="center"|4 |colspan="6" align="center"|Did not advance |- |Mehdi Mouidi |align="center"|1:13.61 |align="center"|6 |align="center"|1:10.90 |align="center"|3 |colspan="6" align="center"|Did not advance |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports * Olympic Winter Games 1968, full results by sports-reference.com Category:Nations at the 1968 Winter Olympics 1968 Winter Olympics Category:1968 in Moroccan sport
